name: Rahmat Ullah
feedback: Kawsar (the owner) is very helpful with anything you need. All the guys there are very friendly and helpful with anything I have ever asked of them. They know everything about every bike the rent (huge selection of rental motorcycles) and about the bikes they sell as well. I like supporting local business and they are probably the best local motorcycle shop in orange county. Thanks guys, you're the best!

name: Sujon Islam
feedback: We came from Germany and decided to do a two day motorcycle trip. At OC we had an extremely friendly service and the bikes we've been looking for were fortunately still available! I had the scrambler, my dad the 1200 Sportster and both were in a top condition! Thank you OC team again for the perfect service!!!

name: Farzana Era
feedback: A huge thanks to OC Motorcycles who made our amazing summer trip possible. Me and my husband traveled a total of 12,000miles with a R1100GS BMW and a Honda CBR1000RR all the way from Costa Mesa to Alaska and back to Costa Mesa. OC Motorcycles gave us quality service with decent prices. I highly recommend this place.

name: Ashraful Islam
feedback: I just turned in a BMW K1200RT that was in near new condition with 19K miles on the odo after a 9 day road trip. (Already missing the bike.) I'm always impressed with the customer service at OCM and this time I noted what great shape the bikes are in. No old beaters here! I really do enjoy renting from them. I can't wait for my next adventure.
